alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 9:32PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTH CENTRAL NEW YORK AND FAR NORTHEAST PENNSYLVANIA... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 931 PM EDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Cherry Valley to near Springville and moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rockland, Oneonta, Fallsburg, Monticello, Honesdale, Liberty, Bethel, Sidney, Damascus and Jackson. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 79 and 116. Interstate 88 near 7, and between 9 and 19. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 206 and 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
